kpi.name: M5000C178

kpi_info.title: HS-DSCH CREDIT REDUCTIONS DUE TO FRAME LOSS
kpi_info.use: Number of HS-DSCH credit reductions due to frame loss. UPDATED: This counter increases when HSDPA congestion control applies rate control when frame losses have been detected based of failed CRC check of HS-DSCH Data Frames or based on gaps in the Frame Sequence Number fields in HS-DSCH Data Frame headers.

kpi.kpi_alias: HS-DSCH CREDIT REDUCTIONS DUE TO FRAME LOSS
